amendment.description: Amendment makes $193.35 million available for the voluntary family planning project under title X.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, made in order by H. Res. 208 and printed as amendment No. 2-1 in House Rept. 104-224, to restore funding for the Title X family planning program by appropriating $193 million in funds for Title X programs and reducing funding for the Maternal and ChildHealth Block Grant program and the Community and Migrant Health Centers program by a comensurate amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greenwood amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 204 (Roll no. 615).
